oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Thomas Garton Newton McCord
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Thomas Garton Newton McCord enlisted in the Confederate Army on Dec. 9, 1861, in Hickman County, by Capt. Nunley and served with Co. A, 48th Tenn. Inf. Regt. He died in Columbus, Miss., in a hospital on June 21, 1862. He contracted pneumonia and the measles. He was buried in an unknown soldier's grave in Friendship Cemetery.
